verses.verse: וַֽעֲתַלְיָה֙ <S%H6271><s%> And when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah [וּרָאֲתָה כ] (רָאֲתָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <S%H1121><s%> that her son וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> she arose וַתְּאַבֵּ֔ד <S%H6><s%> and destroyed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָֽה׃ <S%H4467><s%> royal

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוֹשֶׁ֣בַע <S%H3089><s%> But Jehosheba בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of king י֠וֹרָם <S%H3141><s%> Joram אֲח֨וֹת <S%H269><s%> sister אֲחַזְיָ֜הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3101><s%> Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗ה <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <S%H1589><s%> and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> מִתּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king's [הַמַּמֹותְתִים כ] (הַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <S%H4191><s%> put ק) אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵינִקְתּ֖וֹ <S%H3243><s%> him [even] him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <S%H4296><s%> bed וַיַּסְתִּ֧רוּ <S%H5641><s%> and they hid אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H6271><s%> Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were being הוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> [which were] slain

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become אִתָּהּ֙ <S%H854><s%> her in בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <S%H2244><s%> And he was with her hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <S%H6271><s%> And Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4427><s%> did reign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> over the land פ

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִית <S%H7637><s%> And the seventh שָׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <S%H3077><s%> Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח ׀ <S%H3947><s%> and fetched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the rulers [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> hundred ק) לַכָּרִי֙ <S%H3746><s%> with the captains וְלָ֣רָצִ֔ים <S%H7323><s%> and the guard וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> them to him into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <S%H3772><s%> and made לָהֶ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant וַיַּשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> with them and took an oath אֹתָם֙ <S%H854><s%> in בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of them in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> and shewed אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> them the king's

וַיְצַוֵּ֣ם <S%H6680><s%> And he commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> them saying זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּן <S%H6213><s%> that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֤ית <S%H7992><s%> A third part מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> who בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> of you that enter in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וְשֹׁ֣מְרֵ֔י <S%H8104><s%> shall even be keepers מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> of the watch בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> And a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> [shall be] at the gate ס֔וּר <S%H5495><s%> of Sur וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> and a third part בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> at the gate אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> behind הָרָצִ֑ים <S%H7323><s%> the guard וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H8104><s%> so shall ye keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the watch הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house מַסָּֽח׃ <S%H4535><s%> that it be not broken down

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> And two הַיָּדוֹת֙ <S%H3027><s%> parts בָּכֶ֔ם כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of you all יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> of all you that go forth הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וְשָֽׁמְר֛וּ <S%H8104><s%> even they shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the watch בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וְהִקַּפְתֶּ֨ם <S%H5362><s%> And ye shall compass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> and he that cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> within הַשְּׂדֵר֖וֹת <S%H7713><s%> within the ranges יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> let him be slain וִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and be ye with the king בְּצֵאת֥וֹ <S%H3318><s%> as he goeth out וּבְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H935><s%> and as he cometh in

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> did שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> And the captains [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> hundred ק) כְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּה֮ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> according to all [things] that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and they took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> one בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> were to יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> with them that should go out הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <S%H3077><s%> to Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> give הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> did the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> And to the captains [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> hundred ק) אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲנִית֙ <S%H2595><s%> spears וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <S%H7982><s%> and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> that [were] in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּעַמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood הָרָצִ֜ים <S%H7323><s%> And the guard אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> with his weapons בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> corner הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <S%H3233><s%> from the right עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> corner הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <S%H8042><s%> to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> [along] by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And he brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H5145><s%> the crown וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> upon him and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֥כוּ <S%H4427><s%> and they made him king אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֑הוּ <S%H4886><s%> and anointed וַיַּכּוּ־ <S%H5221><s%> him and they clapped כָ֔ף <S%H3709><s%> their hands וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king ס

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard עֲתַלְיָ֔ה <S%H6271><s%> And when Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise הָֽרָצִ֖ין <S%H7323><s%> of the guard הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> [and] of the people וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַתֵּ֡רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And when she looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> behold the king עֹמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> stood עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הָעַמּ֜וּד <S%H5982><s%> by a pillar כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> as the manner וְהַשָּׂרִ֤ים <S%H8269><s%> [was] and the princes וְהַחֲצֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <S%H2689><s%> and the trumpeters אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> beside הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land שָׂמֵ֔חַ <S%H8056><s%> rejoiced וְתֹקֵ֖עַ <S%H8628><s%> and blew בַּחֲצֹֽצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets וַתִּקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> rent עֲתַלְיָה֙ <S%H6271><s%> and Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדֶ֔יהָ <S%H899><s%> her clothes וַתִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and cried קֶ֥שֶׁר <S%H7195><s%> Treason קָֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H7195><s%> Treason ס

וַיְצַו֩ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <S%H3077><s%> But Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> the captains [הַמֵּיאֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֣ות <S%H3967><s%> hundred ק) פְּקֻדֵ֣י <S%H6485><s%> the officers הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to הוֹצִ֤יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> unto them Have her forth אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> without לַשְּׂדֵרֹ֔ת <S%H7713><s%> the ranges וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> abide אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <S%H310><s%> after that הָמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> her kill בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had said הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> For the priest אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תּוּמַ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> Let her not be slain בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
